senses.sense_definition: A species of heron native to Central and South America, distinguished by its broad, scoop-like beak.

examples.text: The <w>boatbill</w> lives in mangrove swamps and typically feeds at night.
We were lucky to see a <w>boatbill</w> heron resting near the water's edge.

senses.sense_definition: A small bird of the genus Machaerirhynchus found in New Guinea and Australia, characterized by a broad, flat bill.

examples.text: The yellow-breasted <w>boatbill</w> builds its nest high in the trees.
This species of <w>boatbill</w> is native to the rainforests of Queensland.
